content: the griffin blanket is a tunisian crochet blanket pattern featuring two different stitches a classic stitch and a textured stitch it uses a combination of self-striping yarn and solid color which makes the stripes stand out even more the end result is a beautifully striped blanket with a squishy texture you ll love curling up under this blanket is easy enough for a beginner with just a little bit of tunisian crochet knowledge tunisian crochet skill level advanced beginner standard us terms **materials** - lion brand mandala - lion brand pound of love - 7 mm tunisian crochet hook with long cable **techniques** learn a new tunisian crochet textured stitch learn how to change colors in tunisian crochet **measurements** 41″ wide x 63 1/2″ long
